parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.48

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> A [[Multiplayer Scripting#Locality|global]] equivalent of  [[setGroupId]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> group [[setGroupIdGlobal]] [format, keyword1, ..., keywordN]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> group: [[Object]] or [[Group]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> format: [[String]] - format template (e.g "%keyword1 - %keyword2 / %keyword4 (%keyword3)")

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> keyword1..n: [[String]] - keyword value

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[group]] [[player]] [[setGroupIdGlobal]] ["PAPA BEAR"];
[[hint]] [[groupId]] [[group]] [[player]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>"PAPA BEAR"</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setGroupId]], [[groupId]], [[group]]
</value></part></template></root>
